label: Evaluate.Deliberateness.Accidental
definition: The evaluation by a person, organization, or GPE (or the author) that an event is accidental

label: Evaluate.Deliberateness.Deliberate
definition: The evaluation by a person, organization, or GPE (or the author) that an event is deliberate

label: Evaluate.Legitimacy.Illegitimate
definition: The evaluation by a person, organization, or GPE (or the author) that a political event is illegitimate

label: Evaluate.Legitimacy.Legitimate
definition: The evaluation by a person, organization, or GPE (or the author) that a political event is legitimate

label: Evaluate.Sentiment.Negative
definition: Negative sentiment held by a person, organization, or GPE toward any knowledge element

label: Evaluate.Sentiment.Positive
definition: Positive sentiment held by a person, organization, or GPE toward any knowledge element

label: Evaluate.Status.HoaxFraud
template: <arg1> holds that <arg2> is a hoax or a fraud
definition: Explicit mentions asserting that an event or a thing is a hoax or fraud

label: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.<n/a>
definition: The affiliation between an artifact (including vehicles, weapons, commodities, etc.) and another entity.  Artifact-Political-Organization-Religious-Affiliation (APORA).

label: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.ControlTerritory
definition: A side, person, organization, location, or GPE controlling territory.

label: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.NationalityCitizen
definition: The affiliation between an artifact (including vehicles, weapons, commodities, etc.) and a GPE.  Artifact-Political-Organization-Religious-Affiliation (APORA).

label: GeneralAffiliation.ArtifactPoliticalOrganizationReligiousAffiliation.OwnershipPossession
definition: The ownership or possession of an artifact (including vehicles, weapons, commodities, etc.) by a person, group, or side.  Artifact-Political-Organization-Religious-Affiliation (APORA).

label: GeneralAffiliation.MemberOriginReligionEthnicity.<n/a>
definition: The affiliation between a person entity and another entity.  Member-Origin-Religion-Ethnicity (MORE)

label: GeneralAffiliation.MemberOriginReligionEthnicity.Ethnicity
definition: The affiliation between a person entity and an ethnicity.  Member-Origin-Religion-Ethnicity (MORE)

label: GeneralAffiliation.MemberOriginReligionEthnicity.NationalityCitizen
definition: The affiliation between a person entity and a GPE.  Member-Origin-Religion-Ethnicity (MORE)

label: GeneralAffiliation.OrganizationPoliticalReligiousAffiliation.<n/a>
definition: The affiliation between an organization entity and another entity.  Organization-Political-Religious-Affiliation (OPRA)

label: GeneralAffiliation.OrganizationPoliticalReligiousAffiliation.NationalityCitizen
definition: The affiliation between an organization entity and a GPE.  Organization-Political-Religious-Affiliation (OPRA)

label: GeneralAffiliation.OrganizationWebsite.OrganizationWebsite
definition: An official top level URL for an organization entity’s website

label: GeneralAffiliation.Sponsorship.<n/a>
template: <arg1> is sponsored by <arg2>||<arg1> event is sponsored by <arg2>
definition: The sponsorship of events or actors by one-step removed sponsors (or several steps removed, the man-behind-the-curtain, or more likely the country behind the curtain), not otherwise specified||The sponsorship of an event by a one-step removed sponsor (or several steps removed, the man-behind-the-curtain, or more likely the country behind the curtain)

label: GeneralAffiliation.Sponsorship.AdvisePlanOrganize
definition: The sponsorship of events or actors via advising, planning, or organizing by one-step removed sponsors (or several steps removed, the man-behind-the-curtain, or more likely the country behind the curtain)

label: GeneralAffiliation.Sponsorship.Affiliated
definition: The sponsorship of events or actors via affiliation by one-step removed sponsors (or several steps removed, the man-behind-the-curtain, or more likely the country behind the curtain)

label: GeneralAffiliation.Sponsorship.HelpSupport
definition: The sponsorship of events or actors via help or support by one-step removed sponsors (or several steps removed, the man-behind-the-curtain, or more likely the country behind the curtain)

label: Information.Color.Color
definition: The relation between an entity or thing and a color (string)

label: Information.Make.Make
definition: The relation between a thing (such as an artifact, vehicle, or weapon) and its make or brand (string)

label: Measurement.Size.<n/a>
definition: Numerical value of the size of an entity or filler, not otherwise specified

label: Measurement.Size.Count
definition: Numerical totals of a countable entity or filler

label: Measurement.Size.HeightLengthWidth
definition: Numerical value of a dimension of an entity or filler

label: Measurement.Size.Percentage
definition: Percentage value of an entity or filler (such as results)

label: Measurement.Size.Weight
definition: Numerical value of the weight of an entity or filler

label: OrganizationAffiliation.EmploymentMembership.<n/a>
definition: The relationship between a person and the organization or GPE of which the agent is an employee or member, or with which the agent has a contractual business or service agreement, where the context does not distinguish whether the relationship is employment or membership

label: OrganizationAffiliation.EmploymentMembership.Employment
definition: The relationship between a person and the organization or GPE of which the agent is an employee, or with which the agent has a contractual business or service agreement

label: OrganizationAffiliation.EmploymentMembership.Membership
definition: The relationship between a person and the organization or GPE of which the agent is an member, or with which the agent has a membership agreement

label: OrganizationAffiliation.Founder.Founder
definition: This relation captures a person entity and the organization founded by that person

label: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.<n/a>
definition: The relationship between a person and an organization or GPE led by that person, where the context does not distinguish the nature of the organization

label: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.Government
definition: The relationship between a person and a governmental organization or GPE led by that person||The relationship between a person and a governmental organization or GPE led by that person (who is not the head of state)

label: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.HeadOfState
definition: The relationship between a person and a country GPE led by that person

label: OrganizationAffiliation.Leadership.MilitaryPolice
definition: The relationship between a person and a military or police organization led by that person

label: PartWhole.Subsidiary.<n/a>
definition: The ownership, administrative, and other hierarchical relationships between organizations and GPEs, where the context does not make it clear whether the parent in the heirarchy is an organization or a GPE||The ownership, administrative, and other hierarchical relationships between organizations and GPEs, where the context does not make it clear whether the parent in the hierarchy is an organization or a GPE

label: PartWhole.Subsidiary.NationalityCitizen
definition: The ownership, administrative, and other hierarchical relationships between organizations and GPEs, and between governmental organizations and their parent GPE

label: PartWhole.Subsidiary.OrganizationSubsidiary
definition: The ownership, administrative, and other hierarchical relationships between organizations, including relationships between a department within an organization and the organization itself, and between a company and its parent company

label: PersonalSocial.Role.<n/a>
definition: The relationship between a person and their position, occupation, title, or honorific, where the context does not make it clear whether the role is a position or an honorific

label: PersonalSocial.Role.ProfessionalRole
definition: The relationship between a person and their position or occupation

label: PersonalSocial.Role.TitleFormOfAddress
definition: The relationship between a person and their title or honorific

label: PersonalSocial.Relationship.<n/a>
definition: Otherwise unspecified relationship between a person and another person

label: PersonalSocial.Relationship.Political
definition: Otherwise unspecified political relationship between a person and another person

label: Physical.LocatedNear.<n/a>
definition: The physical location of an entity or filler

label: Physical.LocatedNear.Surround
definition: An entity or filler physically surrounding a place

label: Physical.OrganizationHeadquarters.OrganizationHeadquarters
definition: The relation between the headquarters of an organization and the GPE, LOC, or FAC entity in which the headquarters are located

label: Physical.Resident.Resident
definition: All GPE, LOC, and FAC entities in which a person entity has lived

label: ResponsibilityBlame.AssignBlame.AssignBlame
definition: An entity blamed for an event

label: ResponsibilityBlame.ClaimResponsibility.ClaimResponsibility
definition: An entity claiming responsibility for an event

label: Evaluate.Belief.CommittedBelief
template: <arg1> believes with certainty that <arg2> is true
definition: Explicit mention of an entity believing with certainty that an event or information object is true

label: Evaluate.Belief.NonCommittedBelief
template: <arg1> believes <arg2> is possibly but not necessarily true
definition: Explicit mention of an entity believing an event or information object is possibly but not necessarily true; they do not have a strong belief in it

label: Evaluate.Intent.Intent
template: <arg1> intends, plans for, or attempts <arg2> event
definition: Explicit mention of an entity intending a future event or planning or attempting to achieve it
